synopsis.text: Could Kazuomi Honjou, a charmer who bounces from lover to lover, finally be meeting his match? After being ousted by his latest girlfriend for his less-than-romantic ways, Kazuomi finds himself without a place to stay. Enter Mizuki Shinohara, a young and attractive model with a comfortable apartment. Kazuomi, ever the opportunist, propositions Mizuki with an offer he hopes he can't refuse: a night of unforgettable passion in exchange for a place to crash. To Kazuomi's surprise, Mizuki agrees, sparking a connection that neither of them expected. As the pair continues their arrangement, Mizuki finds himself drawn to Kazuomi in ways he never thought possible. Could this be the start of something more, or will Kazuomi's past catch up with him? Dive into this captivating tale of love, lust, and the unexpected twists that life can bring.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
